full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,THEG PA CHEN PO'I GSO SBYONG GI SDOM PA GZHAN LA 'PHOGS PA DANG RANG GI LEN TSUL GSAL BAR BKOD PA SKAL BZANG 'JUG NGOS ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @012B (CES THEG PA CHEN PO'I GSO SBYONG GI SDOM PA GZHAN LA 'BOGS PA DANG RANG GIS LEN TSUL GSAL BAR BKOD PA SKAL BZANG 'JUG NGOGS ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, AU RANG SHOG GI GRVA TSANG DGA' LDAN DAM CHOS GLING GI RGYUD PA BLA ZUNG, GANGS CAN MGON POS DANG LDAN MKHAN POR BSNGAGS PA'I BSHES GNYEN DAM PA RAB 'BYAMS PA BYAMS PA CHOS LDAN LAGS NAS BSKUL MA MDZAD PA LTAR, RANG GZHAN DU MA LA MKHO CHE BAR YANG MTHONG NAS, ^DAM PA GONG MA RNAMS KYI LEGS BSHAD DANG PHYAG BZHES LA BRTEN NAS, BAN RGAN SGOM LAS PA, ^DAM TSIG RDO RJES SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DPYOD LDAN DBANG PO GSOL DPON DGE SLONG BSTAN 'DZIN BZANG POS BGYIS PA'O, ,DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,)
